title: Submission Log add-submission dropdowns: integrated search with live filtering

requirements.summary: Refine the four Submission Log belt add-submission combobox controls to use a cleaner dropdown with an integrated search field and real-time option filtering, implemented only in SubmissionSelectInput.tsx.
acceptanceCriteria: Each belt’s add-submission control opens a dropdown that shows the complete options list by default and filters the list in real time as the user types.
The search input is presented as part of the dropdown experience in a clean, compact way (no visually awkward separation between the trigger and the search field).
The dropdown remains keyboard-accessible (type to filter, arrow keys to navigate, enter to select) and closes upon selection.
No other Submission Log elements outside the four selected add-submission controls are modified.

file_operations.description: Update the existing Popover+Command-based combobox UI to a cleaner dropdown pattern with an integrated search field at the top of the dropdown surface and live filtering of the full submission list (excluding already-selected submissions). Ensure keyboard accessibility (typing filters, arrow navigation, enter selects), autofocus/interaction polish, and close-on-select behavior—without changing any other Submission Log UI or any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
